dt-api.name: columns().names()
dt-api.summary: Get the names for the selected columns.

type.description: Get the names that has been set for the selected columns (set via `-init columns.name`).
type.returns: API instance with the result set set to the names of the selected columns. Those values will be an empty string if a name was not set.

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to retrieve the names of selected columns that has been set through the `-init columns.name` option.
This can be useful for the identification of columns, particularly when using orthogonal data, however, setting a column name does not functionally change the behaviour of a DataTable.
